mapper.sql:
FROM fdcodegroup a WHERE 1=1
AND fdcgDelNy = 1 AND fdcgDelNy = 0
AND fdcgName LIKE concat('%',#{shFdcgName},'%')
AND fdcgName LIKE concat('%',#{shValue},'%') AND fdcgNameEng LIKE concat('%',#{shValue},'%')
mapper.select:
SELECT a. fdcgSeq , a.fdcgName , a.fdcgNameEng , a.fdcgDelNy
LIMIT #{startRnumForMysql},#{rowNumToShow}
SELECT a. fdcgSeq , a.fdcgName , a.fdcgDelNy FROM fdcodegroup a WHERE 1=1 and fdcgDelNy = 0 and fdcgSeq = #{fdcgSeq}
